channel.title: Scythe
channel.description:
I was going to enter this in the modeling contest but it has to many faces...:( I used rectangles instead of triangles. so i made this:
(v1.0) [img]http://img515.imageshack.us/img515/8152/sythe.png[/img] i'll probably make the blade a lot less...round...
(v1.5) New [img]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/8476/sythev2.png[/img] All i did in v1.5 was make the blade thinner.

item.title: Scythe
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

dylan_0789:

I like this one. You’re showing improvement. Also, how many faces is it? if you can get it within 2,000 tri or 1,000 quads and delete the images, i’ll allow you to enter the model contest with it.

2.5k tri and like 5k quads :
i tried to lower them but the scythe looks ugly…

Read full topic

item.title: Scythe
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:5, topic:328410”][quote author=Mr Mopar link=topic=424799.msg3119810#msg3119810 date=1265429430]

I was going to enter this in the modeling contest but it has to many faces…
I used rectangles instead of triangles.
so i made this:
http://img515.imageshack.us/img515/8152/sythe.png
i’ll probably make the blade a lot less…round…

when you get the 3d idea, you really get it -.-
Anyway nice, but the blade definitely look blunt, and that it would be more of a smack then a slash…

I know, i’m making the blade thinner
[/quote]

Cool… Give it a more realistic look for the time, atm everything looks TO polished, like the handle for example[/quote]
I will but atm i’m posting the scythe with a thin blade.

Read full topic

Anyway nice, but the blade definitely look blunt, and that it would be more of a smack then a slash…
[/quote]
I know, i’m making the blade thinner :p[/quote]

Cool… Give it a more realistic look for the time, atm everything looks TO polished, like the handle for example
